articles.author: Amar Sunil Panicker
articles.title: No Virat Kohli vs Naveen-ul-Haq: Afghanistan Announce Squad for Asia Cup 2023 as LSG Pacer Misses Out - News18
articles.description: Fans will be disappointed to know that they will not be able to see the rematch between Naveen-ul-Haq and Virat Kohli as the former misses out from the Afghanistan squad for Asia Cup 2023.
articles.content: The tussle between Afghanistans Naveen-ul-Haq and Indias Virat Kohli lit up the Indian Premier League (IPL), not too long ago. Fans were anticipating the encounter for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023 as w… [+2567 chars]
